## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G28650](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G28650)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MIK1, PXL2</u>
- **Gene Name:** MDIS1-INTERACTING RECEPTOR LIKE KINASE1, PXY-like2
- **Description:**   Leucine-rich repeat transmembrane protein kinase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS2110823]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;anthocyanin build up in leaves and cotyledons; reduced apical dominance
   - [CS2110824]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;short stature
   - [CS2110825]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;short stature
   - [CS2110828]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;short stature
   - [CS31095]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No visible mutant phenotype.
   - [SALK_095005C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Defects in pollen tube guidance, manifesting as polytuby or pollen tube failure.
